Description of incident: HMSA notified 10,800 members of a data breach when letters communicating care management went to the wrong addresses.The information compromised included patient names, management of certain health conditions and steps individuals could take to identify or treat an ailment."Members are encouraged to visit hmsa.com/media-center to see copies of the letters. Members who have questions about this mailing can visit an HMSA Center or office. They can also call (808) 948-6404 on Oahu and 1 (800) 459-3963 toll-free on the Neighbor Islands or the Mainland, from  8 a.m.- 5 p.m. Hawaii Time, Monday to Friday."More information: https://hmsa.com/media-center/2015/12/letter-error/
